name: Godzilla Defense Force
description:
"Godzilla Defense Force"" is a base defense game featuring iconic monsters from the Godzilla franchise and TOHO's official IP! Tap to play, prepare your units, and defend against oncoming monsters!

Monsters from across the Godzilla series are on the move, and it's up to you to recruit these powerful beasts to save the world!

Defend cities around the world from gigantic beasts! This game features Godzilla and other kaiju from 29 different movies, from the original 1954 film to the present day!

Battle in monster wars with allies like MechaGodzilla and Jet Jaguar! Collect monsters you defeat as ""Monster Cards,"" which can be used as Skills or Buffs.

Defeat kaiju and collect Monster Cards to unlock the ""Codex,"" which contains detailed descriptions of all the monsters alongside images from their famous movies!

Kaiju from Godzilla’s history are here, from Mothra to King Ghidorah, and they’re ready to destroy the world or die trying!

Defend your base against monsters from every Godzilla movie in Godzilla Defense Force!

※Godzilla Defense Force Features:

[Godzilla Game]
- Everyone from Godzilla 1954 to the present!
- Monsters from 29 movies rampage onto your device with this official Godzilla defense clicker game!
- Collect Godzilla Cards to summon Godzilla during the battle!
- Learn more about Godzilla and his pantheon of monsters in the Monster Codex!

[Base Defense]
- Monsters from across Godzilla's lore are attacking major cities! Tokyo, London, and Sydney need your help! Can you defend them against these monsters of legend!
- Bolster your forces through lunar colonization and a special time-traveling mechanic!
- Defend against waves of monsters, kaiju, and Godzilla himself!

[Idle Clicker Game]
- As a clicker game, you just tap to play. Select your units, build your city and let the battle begin!
- Idle gameplay lets you put your defenses to the test while giant monsters attack
- Defend multiple cities at once while the game plays itself!

[Collect Monsters]
- Battle monsters and collect their cards
- Collect monsters like Rodan, Dagarah, Biollante, Ebirah, Mothra and more!
- Open packs of cards to find new, rare monsters!
- Upgrade monsters to improve their stats

Godzilla’s monster war has begun! Battle monsters, collect cards, build your base and defend the world in Godzilla Defense Force – download now!

※ Recommended Specifications
Godzilla Defense Force requires at least OS 9 / iPhone 6S or better for smooth gameplay. The game may crash on devices that don't meet these requirements.

■ App Permissions Information
In order to provide the below services, we are requesting certain permissions.

[Essential Permission]
"Photos/Media/Files" must be enabled to attach in-game screenshots for CS.

※ Please note that optional permission does not affect the gameplay.

[Permission Management]
▶ Settings > Privacy > Find and select Permission > Turn permissions on or off
※ If the app does not request consent for the permission, you can manage the permission by the above steps.
